Financial: Military retirement pay exclusion from state income tax
Veterans preference in state employment (5-10 points)
Small business development assistance for veterans
Tennessee Dept of Veterans Services emergency financial assistance
Education: HOPE Scholarship for veterans - covers tuition at Tennessee colleges
Veterans Education Success Grant - up to ,000 for career training
In-state tuition for veterans using GI Bill benefits
Children of fallen military scholarship program
Recreation: Free hunting and fishing licenses for 100% disabled veterans
Reduced-fee licenses for other disabled veterans
Housing: Disabled Veterans Property Tax Relief - full exemption for 100% disabled
Property tax freeze for elderly disabled veterans
Surviving spouse property tax exemption continuation
Other: Stand Down events for homeless veterans
